quote: La única forma de hacer un gran trabajo es amar lo que haces.
translation: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Soyez le changement que vous voulez voir dans le monde.
translation: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: あなたは一度しか生きられませんが、正しく生きれば一度で十分です。
translation: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

quote: 我们的生活目的不是为了快乐，而是为了有用、光荣、富有同情心，使我们的生活有所不同。
translation: The purpose of our lives is not to be happy, but to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make a difference that we lived.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: A vida é o que acontece enquanto você está ocupado fazendo outros planos.
translation: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: أفضل منظر يأتي بعد أصعب تسلق.
translation: The best view comes after the hardest climb.
author: Unknown

quote: Mae’r dyfodol yn perthyn i’r rhai sy’n credu ym mharddweh eu breuddwydion.
translation: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: 천 마일의 여정은 한 걸음으로 시작된다.
translation: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: No todos los que vagan están perdidos.
translation: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Într-o lume care încearcă în mod constant să te transforme în altcineva, a fi tu însuți este cea mai mare realizare.
translation: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Croyez que vous pouvez et vous êtes à mi-chemin.
translation: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: La diferencia entre ordinario y extraordinario es ese pequeño extra.
translation: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Es scheint immer unmöglich, bis es getan ist.
translation: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Ehara i te mea ko te angitu te mutunga, ko te hinga kaore i te mate: ko te maia ki te haere tonu te mea nui.
translation: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: 時計を見てはいけません。時計がすることをし続けてください。
translation: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: 唯一の制限は、私たちの今日の疑いです。
translation: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: El secreto para avanzar es comenzar.
translation: The secret of getting ahead is to get started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Quanto mais difícil a batalha, mais doce a vitória.
translation: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
author: Unknown

quote: 如果你想过有目标的人生，你必须找到你的激情。
translation: If you want to live a life of purpose, you must find your passion.
author: Unknown

quote: L'avenir n'est pas une destination, mais un processus.
translation: The future is not a destination, but a process.
author: Unknown

quote: Cree en ti mismo y ya estarás a medio camino.
translation: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: La différence entre l'ordinaire et l'extraordinaire est ce petit plus.
translation: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: いつも完全に不可能に思えることも、成功するまではそうだ。
translation: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Der Erfolg ist nicht endgültig, das Scheitern ist nicht fatal: Es ist der Mut, weiterzumachen, der zählt.
translation: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: لا تراقب الساعة، افعل ما تفعله. استمر.
translation: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: A única limitação para nossa realização de amanhã serão nossas dúvidas de hoje.
translation: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: 成功への秘訣は、始めることである。
translation: The secret of getting ahead is to get started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: أقسى المعارك تجلب أحلى الانتصارات.
translation: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
author: Unknown

quote: Si quieres vivir una vida con propósito, debes encontrar tu pasión.
translation: If you want to live a life of purpose, you must find your passion.
author: Unknown

quote: L'avenir n'est pas une destination, mais un processus.
translation: The future is not a destination, but a process.
author: Unknown

quote: ᐃᓅᓯᕗᑦ ᐱᓕᕆᐊᖅ ᑐᑭᖃᑦᑕᕐᓂᖅ ᐃᓅᓯᖃᑎᒌᑦᑐᑦ, ᑭᓯᐊᓂᓕ ᐱᓕᕆᐊᖅ ᐃᓅᓯᖃᑎᒌᑦᑐᑦ ᑐᑭᖃᑦᑕᖅᐸᑦ.
translation: Love is not about finding the perfect person, it's about making the person you have perfect.
author: Unknown

quote: Een goede vriend is iemand die naar je problemen luistert, maar ook weet wanneer hij zijn mond moet houden en je laat huilen.
translation: A good friend is someone who will listen to your problems, but also knows when to shut up and let you cry.
author: Unknown

quote: Kebaikan adalah bahasa yang didengar oleh hati.
translation: Kindness is the language which the heart speaks to the ear.
author: Saint Francis of Assisi

quote: Die besten und schönsten Dinge der Welt kann man nicht sehen oder anfassen - man muss sie mit dem Herzen fühlen.
translation: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Un verdadero amigo es aquel que te ve en tu mejor momento y te ama en tu peor momento.
translation: A true friend is one who sees you at your best and loves you at your worst.
author: Unknown

quote: การให้อภัยคือการแก้แค้นที่หอมหวานที่สุด
translation: Forgiveness is the sweetest revenge.
author: Unknown

quote: Sei der Grund, warum jemand heute lächelt.
translation: Be the reason someone smiles today.
author: Unknown

quote: Den bedste måde at finde sig selv på er at miste sig selv i andres tjeneste.
translation: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Ang isang tao na hindi maaaring maging masaya nang walang iba ay hindi talaga masaya.
translation: A person who can't be happy without others is not happy at all.
author: Unknown

quote: สิ่งที่สำคัญที่สุดคือการมีความสุข
translation: The most important thing is to be happy.
author: Unknown

quote: Burua da dena. Zer pentsatzen duzun, hura bihurtuko zara.
translation: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Ihre Einstellung bestimmt Ihre Höhe.
translation: Your attitude determines your altitude.
author: Unknown

quote: La única persona que estás destinado a ser es la persona que decides ser.
translation: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Terimalah kekacauan, di situlah keajaiban terjadi.
translation: Embrace the chaos, it's where the magic happens.
author: Unknown

quote: Den bedste måde at forudsige fremtiden er at skabe den.
translation: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Не ждите идеального момента. Возьмите момент и сделайте его идеальным.
translation: Don't wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
author: Unknown

quote: Perjalanan seribu mil dimulai dengan satu langkah.
translation: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Tajna promene je usmeravanje sve energije ne na borbu protiv starog, već na izgradnju novog.
translation: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
author: Socrates

quote: होना वह बदलाव जो तुम दुनिया में देखना चाहते हो।
translation: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: もしあなたが地獄を通っているなら、進み続けなさい。
translation: If you are going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: L'unico modo per uscirne è attraversarlo.
translation: The only way out is through.
author: Unknown

quote: 七転び八起き
translation: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: La plus grande gloire de vivre ne réside pas dans le fait de ne jamais tomber, mais de se relever à chaque chute.
translation: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Penye nia pana njia.
translation: Where there's a will, there's a way.
author: Swahili Proverb

quote: Whāia te iti kahurangi.
translation: Seek the treasure you value most.
author: Māori Proverb

quote: Det finns inget dåligt väder, bara dåliga kläder.
translation: There’s no bad weather, only bad clothing.
author: Swedish Proverb

quote: قطره قطره جمع گردد، وانگهی دریا شود.
translation: Drop by drop, a river forms.
author: Persian Proverb

quote: Ìwà lẹwà.
translation: Character is beauty.
author: Yoruba Proverb

quote: Damlaya damlaya göl olur.
translation: Drop by drop, a lake forms.
author: Turkish Proverb

quote: Umuntu ngumuntu ngabantu.
translation: A person is a person through other people.
author: Zulu Proverb

quote: Có công mài sắt, có ngày nên kim.
translation: With effort, an iron rod can be sharpened into a needle.
author: Vietnamese Proverb

quote: Kto nie idzie do przodu, ten się cofa.
translation: He who does not move forward, falls behind.
author: Polish Proverb

quote: Gwell byth na hwyrach.
translation: Better late than never.
author: Welsh Proverb
